socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants elemental resistances and elemental ailment immunity to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain +39% to all Elemental Resistances
You and nearby allies are Immune to all Elemental Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants mana regeneration to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies Regenerate 2.9 Mana per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
Your and nearby allies' Skills Cost no Mana
hybrid.secDescrText: Casts a temporary aura that lets you and your allies cast skills without paying their mana costs.

properties.name: Attack, AoE, Movement, Travel, Physical, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing off-hand damage in a small area in front of you. You deal damage in a larger area when you reach the target. The further you travel, the more damage you deal, and the greater your chance of stunning enemies. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
explicitMods: 134 to 200 Base Off Hand Physical Damage
5 to 7 Added Physical Damage per 15 Armour or Evasion Rating on Shield
75% increased Stun Threshold reduction on enemies at Maximum charge distance
100% more Damage with Hits at Maximum Charge Distance
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.typeLine: Abecedarian's Gold Flask of the Order
craftedMods: 30% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Soul Brow
craftedMods: 45% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain Rare or Unique Enemies

explicitMods: 40% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain Enemies
items.descrText: Right click to apply this to your weapons. Only one Tincture in your belt can be applied to your weapons at a time. Requires the Coated Blade Passive to be allocated on Warden of the Maji Passive Skill Tree to use this item.

items.name: Greed's Embrace
flavourText: Some would question if the risk was worth it.
The rest were already dead.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports mark curse skills.
explicitMods: 16% reduced Effect of Marks from Supported Skills
Trigger Supported Skill when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy with an Attack
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: 20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 40% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 44 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 725 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 1738.6 Base Fire Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the armour and evasion of nearby allies, and reduces the critical strike chance of nearby enemies. Gains stages over time while carrying the banner near enemies. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies have 24% increased Armour and Evasion Rating
Nearby Enemies have 40% reduced Critical Strike Chance
Gain 1 Stage every 0.2 seconds while an Enemy is Nearby

Taunt nearby Enemies for 0.15 seconds per Stage on Placing the Banner
Enemies Taunted this way deal 15% less Damage
Base Duration of 10.00 seconds after being Placed
+1 second to Base Placed Banner Duration per Stage
When placed, 8% increased Area of Effect per Stage
When placed, 1% increased Aura effect per Stage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Ventor's Gamble
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

items.name: Divination Distillate
explicitMods: 12% increased Quantity of Items found during Effect
30% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Knowledge is fermented in pain and loss
Distilled with reflection
To quench the thirst of those
who dream of enlightenment

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: Sadima's Touch
explicitMods: Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks
flavourText: Wealth unspent is wealth wasted.

items.name: Eyes of the Greatwolf
flavourText: I am but a vessel for a greater force.
It acts through me. Speaks through me.
Decides what lives and dies through me.
And will change the world through me.

items.typeLine: Analyst's Quartz Flask of the Mockingbird
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
explicitMods: 47% reduced Effect of Curses on you during Effect

explicitMods: +100 to Maximum Life per Red Socket
+100 to Maximum Mana per Green Socket
+100 to Maximum Energy Shield per Blue Socket
15% increased Item Quantity per White Socket
flavourText: A man who changes his loyalties often,
soon finds he has none.

items.name: Perandus Blazon
implicitMods: 36% increased Critical Strike Chance during any Flask Effect
explicitMods: -2 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
flavourText: A large enough debt turns even a friend
into an enemy, and the Perandus family
had more debtors than anyone.

items.name: Goldwyrm
implicitMods: Regenerate 100 Life per second while moving
flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fire a projectile from your wand that changes direction in a zig-zag pattern at regular intervals or when hitting enemies. Each time it changes direction, a secondary projectile breaks off, flying in the direction it changed away from.
explicitMods: Increases and Reductions to Spell Damage also apply to Attack Damage from this Skill at 200% of their value
Modifiers which would cause projectiles to Fork instead cause them to change direction additional times
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports projectile skills, making their projectiles fork into two projectiles the first time they hit an enemy and don't pierce it.

items.name: Sentari's Answer
explicitMods: Curse Enemies with Punishment when you Block their Melee Damage, ignoring Curse Limit
Curse Enemies with Temporal Chains when you Block their Projectile Attack Damage, ignoring Curse Limit
Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness when you Block their Spell Damage, ignoring Curse Limit
flavourText: Open your eyes and you will see the cracks in your enemy's walls.
Open your mind and you will see the cracks in your enemy's plans.

The buff's duration will be refreshed if you spend enough life before it expires.
explicitMods: Deals 7.8 Base Physical Damage per second
Buff Duration is refreshed after you spend a total of 26 Life
